text: Jack Sherman (January 18, 1956August 18, 2020) was an American guitarist. He was best known as the second guitarist to have joined Red Hot Chili Peppers. He played on their debut album. He co-wrote much of their second album, Freaky Styley. Sherman died on August 18, 2020 at the age of 64.Jack Sherman Dies: Red Hot Chili Peppers Guitarist Was 64 ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Miami
title: Jack Sherman
